Package com.sun.identity.policy.jaas

Provides classes for performing policy evaluation against Access Manager using JAAS ( Java Authentication and Authorization) framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ISPermission This class provides the support for JAAS Authorization service Its a new JAAS Permission which extends the Permission class.
ISPolicy This is an implementation of abstract class javax.security.auth.Policy for representing the system security policy for a Java application environment.
 

Package com.sun.identity.policy.jaas Description

Provides classes for performing policy evaluation against Access Manager using JAAS ( Java Authentication and Authorization) framework.
